name: CODE Veg
description:
Small game made for Stay Safe Jam 2020

Controls:
Arrow Keys/WASD - Movement/Selection
Spacebar - Confirm/Interact
Esc - Pause

Read letters at your doorstep with instructions on what to do.
Plant seeds in pots in your house and water them each day to see them grow into delicious vegetables that you can send to people in need using the state of the art delivery pigeon technology. 
Use the computer to buy seeds you need and rest in your bed when you're done tending to you vegetables.
Luckily dept isn't real in this world but try to end your adventure with a net profit.

Whilst the game is designed to be played entirely with keyboard, if any UI issues occur you are able to use the mouse to get yourself out of trouble. (Also makes delivering a bit easier)

Made with Weronika Walczak (As co-designer and artist)
https://walcz.itch.io/

External Resources Used: (Background Theme)
"Airport Lounge"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
